import React,{useEffect,useState} from 'react' import FileBase from 'react-file-base64'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Form, Button, Container } from 'react-bootstrap'; import {fetchSingleProduct, editProduct, deleteProduct} from '../api/api' const EditProductScreen = (props) => { const { id } = props.match.params; const [productData, setProductData] = useState({category:'',name:'', description:'', brand:'', price:0 ,countInStock:0, image:'' }) const submitHandler = async(e) =>{ e.preventDefault() await editProduct(id,productData); } const deleteHandler = async(e) =>{ e.preventDefault() await deleteProduct(id) console.log('deleted!') } useEffect(()=>{ const productData = async () => { const { data } = await fetchSingleProduct(id); setProductData(data) }; productData() },[id]) return(
Product Name setProductData({ ...productData, name: e.target.value })} value={productData.name}/> Brand Name setProductData({ ...productData, brand: e.target.value })} value={productData.brand}/> Description setProductData({ ...productData, description: e.target.value })} value={productData.description} /> Category setProductData({ ...productData, category: e.target.value })} value={productData.category} />
setProductData({ ...productData, image: base64 })}/>
Price setProductData({ ...productData, price: e.target.value })} value={productData.price} />
) } export default EditProductScreen;
